page.title: 17RELIGION IN DIPTON.
page.content: St.PATRICK'S CHURCH by KATHRYN MORRIS. {Our parish church stands in the same {grounds as our school.It is a Roman {Catholic church.Our priest is Father {J.Donnelly.There are 3 Masses every {Sunday,& an 8.30am.mass during the {week. The busiest times of the year for services are Christmas & Easter.Every May we have a large Procession in honour of Our Lady.Children aged 7, make their First Holy Communion during May,a month devoted to Our Lady. { At the 10.30am.mass on Christmas Day, {we bring our gifts to mass & they are {blessed by Fr.Donnelly. In 1983 at St.Patrick's there were 13 Baptisms,5 Marriages,& 7 Deaths.The average attendance for Sunday Mass was 450.The Catholic population in the area was 1,098.
